body: {"isCompliant": false, "violations": [{"type": "VISA_RESTRICTION", "text": "OPT EAD, STEM OPT, H4 EAD, GC, H1B, L2 EAD, H1 B, OPT-EAD, H1-B, GC EAD, H4-EAD, OPT", "severity": "CRITICAL", "message": "The document explicitly lists visa and work authorization statuses for candidates, which violates EEOC regulations by potentially enabling discrimination based on immigration status.
